# type

**Instance Property**

The type of the specified press.

## Declaration

```swift
var type: UIPress.PressType { get }
```

## Discussion

For a list of all possible types, see the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPress/PressType] enumeration.

## Getting press attributes

- **key**: The key pressed or released on a physical keyboard.
- **phase**: The current press phase of the object.
- **timestamp**: The time when the press occurred or when it was last mutated.
